programme.title: Daig Kayo Ng Lola Ko
programme.desc: About a stereotypical grandmother who is kind, loving and attentive. Unknown to many, she is benevolent keeper of an extraordinary and mystical family secret.

programme.title: It's Showtime

programme.title: Noel Juico, 16 Batang Kriminal
programme.desc: Noel (Raymart Santiago) tries to stay out of trouble. But trouble seems to follow him anyway. Can Noel disentangle himself from the dangerous web he himself created?

programme.title: Si Mokong, Si Astig At Si Gamol
programme.desc: Mokong and Astig were former street kids who now had wards of their own. They used their wits to support them with all types of scam.

programme.title: Ang Titser Kong Pogi
programme.desc: Joey Perez (Bong Revilla, Jr), a policeman goes to Subic as a Kindergarten teacher to secretly investigate the case where he was framed up. He becomes attached to Cynthia, a co-teacher and Jimbo.

programme.title: Tgis, The Movie
programme.desc: The top-rating TV show about teen-age life came to the screen in this adventure film where the TGIS kids learned the value of friendship.

programme.title: Campus Beat
programme.desc: The 15-year old Aga personifies the young man of the times. He is living a normal teen-age life, doing a balancing act between his separated parents, his family and his friends, his studies and his love for music and the beginnings of young love.

programme.title: Kailan Tama Ang Mali? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a film about women in the underbelly of the city of Manila where making a living is always difficult for the poor and material things do not guarantee happiness.

programme.title: Agaw-Armas
programme.desc: Benjie (Bong Revilla) is a hotel security officer who has just about everything going for him. His life seems almost perfect. Then, he is linked to a shooting incident tha may forever change his life.

programme.title: Dos Bravos
programme.desc: Pancho (Niño Muhlach) is travelling from one town to the next in the hope of finding his long lost father. His only clue is a handkerchief embroidered with an emblem of Hacienda BM. Later, Pancho ask the help of Valdes (Dante Varona).

programme.title: Kadenang Bulaklak
programme.desc: Three little girls were given up for adoption after their parents were killed in an accident. Vina, the oldest sister, was left behind with an aunt. She vowed that one day, she would find all her sisters and reunite her family.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka... Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Onyok Velasco Story
programme.desc: Born to a family of boxers, Onyok Velasco ate and breathed boxing. The whole nation watched his fight, hoping and praying for Onyok to win the gold. Robbed of the gold or not, Onyok, without doubt, came home victorious.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Matinik Na Bading, Mga Syokeng Buking
programme.desc: Apolinario and his uncle Boyong came from a family of barbers. They earned very little and in order to make more, they pretended to be gay.

programme.title: Amo
programme.desc: This action movie tackles the issue of labor union. Starring Rudy Fernandez as Leon delos Reyes.

programme.title: Ang Misis Kong Hoodlum
programme.desc: Behind his bad boy image, Ben (Robin Padilla) has a big heart. The modern day Robinhood collects grease money from jeepney drivers in behalf of the syndicate. He then gets a meager amount in return which he uses to feed his adoptive parents whom he loves dearly.

programme.title: Hotshots (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: This is a story of adolescent boys and girls and their early experiences in life and love. How they took life’s realities and learned its lessons. Starring the country’s top singer Gary Valenciano and matinee idol Aga Mulach.

programme.title: Sinasamba Kita (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lorna, the illegitimate daughter of a business tycoon was left in the care of her half-sister, Vilma, upon the death of their father. Though she took care of all her material needs, she refused to show the girl any kind of affection.

programme.title: Berdugo (Gabriel Lorenzo)
programme.desc: He is an honest and dedicated cop whose life shatters when a drug syndicate frames him up and massacres his family.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: Grease Gun Gang
programme.desc: A renewed ex-convict (Robin Padilla) decided to change his friends’ lifestyle after he came out of the jail.

programme.title: Irosin, Pagputok Ng Araw... Babaha ng Dugo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo portrays P/Capt. Antonio Dy, Station Commander of Irosin, Sorsogon. Dy is a recipient of the Medal of Valor from Pres. Cory Aquino for defending the municipal hall from armed NPA rebels.

programme.title: Lalakwe
programme.desc: Anna falls in love with and gives her womanhood to womanizer Eric who promises her marriage. Upon her brother’s insistence to meet the man, she realizes then that Eric is married.

programme.title: Tondo, Libingan Ng Mga Siga
programme.desc: Utoy (Paolo Contis) idolizes his friend and benefactor Johnny (Vic Sotto), whom he looks up to as an older brother. Johnny finds employment as a driver and bodyguard for pretty commercial model Jessica (Christine Jacob).

programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?
